TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StripLine extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElement

summary.span: 表示圖表的帶狀線。

span.span: Represents the strip lines on a chart.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 帶狀線或帶狀線，會加上陰影的規則或自訂的間隔中的圖表背景的水平或垂直範圍。Strip lines, or strips, are horizontal or vertical ranges that shade the background of a chart in regular or custom intervals. 您可以使用區域線：You can use strip lines to: - 改善可讀性，讓查詢在圖表上的個別值。Improve readability for looking up individual values on the chart. - 在讀取圖表的個別資料點。Separate data points when reading the chart. - 反白顯示在定期間隔發生的日期，例如，若要識別週末資料點。Highlight dates that occur at regular intervals, for example, to identify weekend data points. - 反白顯示資料的特定索引鍵範圍。Highlight a specific key range of data. - 加入臨界值線條為特定的常值。Add a threshold line at a specific constant value. 單一物件可以是繪製一次，或重複，在給定的間隔。A single object can either be drawn once, or repeatedly, for a given interval. 此動作由控制屬性。This action is controlled by the property. 當為零的值指派給屬性、 一個區域會繪製線條。When a value of zero is assigned to the property, one strip line will be drawn. 當為非零的值指派給屬性，會重複地繪製帶狀線，在每個指定的間隔。When a non-zero value is assigned to the property, a strip line will be drawn repeatedly at each given interval. 其中繪製帶狀線的位置也會受到和帶狀線的屬性。The location where a strip line is drawn is also affected by the and properties of the strip line. 帶狀線一律是與相關聯物件。Strip lines are always associated with an object. 它們可以加入在設計階段和執行的階段。They can be added at both design time and run time. 若要新增的水平或垂直列，以顯示臨界值，設定屬性設為 0.0 的值。To add a horizontal or vertical line to display a threshold, set the property to a value of 0.0. 這會導致所畫之線條。This will result in a line being drawn. 您可以使用，和色彩、 寬度和線條的樣式屬性。You can use the , and properties for the color, width and style of the line. 任何圖表背景屬性 (`Back*`) 時使用屬性設定為 0.0。No chart background properties (`Back*`) are used when the property is set to 0.0. 使用帶狀線文字使用帶狀線關聯的屬性。Use the property of the strip line to associate text with a strip line. 位置和方向的這段文字可以控制屬性。The placement and orientation of this text can be controlled by the property. 針對同一個軸定義了多個帶狀線，很可能會重疊的帶狀線。When multiple strip lines are defined for the same axis, it is possible that the strip lines will overlap. 疊置順序物件由其訂單中項目的物件。The Z-order of objects is determined by their order of occurrence in the object. 這表示，第一次出現第一次; 繪製第二次出現的繪製，第二個，依此類推。This means that the first occurrence is drawn first; the second occurrence is drawn second, and so on. 帶狀線不支援下列圖表類型：圓形圖、 環圈圖、 漏斗圖、 金字塔圖，Kagi、 ThreeLineBreak，PointAndFigure，極座標圖和雷達圖。Strip lines are not supported for the following chart types: Pie, Doughnut, Funnel, Pyramid, Kagi, ThreeLineBreak, PointAndFigure, Polar and Radar.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 取得或設定帶狀線的背景色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the strip line.
A structure.
The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以為任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍） 值來設定這個屬性。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 若要設定帶狀線的漸層，設定和屬性。To set a gradient for the strip line, set the and properties. 如果您設定此色彩為 「 透明 」-亦即設定為 0 的 alpha 值-無色彩會指派給項目的背景。If you set this color to "transparent" - in other words, set the alpha value to 0 - no color will be assigned to the background of the element. 如此一來，背景就是透明的。As a result, the background will be transparent. 如果屬性設定為 0.0 時，會繪製一條線和屬性會決定線條，不需將此屬性的色彩。If the property is set to 0.0, a line will be drawn and the property will determine the color of the line, not this property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::GradientStyle BackGradientStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::GradientStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::GradientStyle value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定帶狀線的漸層樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the gradient style of the strip line.
A enumeration.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定是否圖表項目會顯示漸層，以及方向的漸層中，如果使用。The property determines whether a chart element will display a gradient, as well as the orientation of the gradient, if used. 若要使用漸層色彩：To use gradient colors: - 使用屬性來設定主要色彩。Use the property to set the primary color. - 使用屬性來設定次要色彩。Use the property to set the secondary color. - 設定此所需的漸層樣式的圖表項目的屬性。Set this property of the chart element to the desired gradient style. 這個屬性不適用如果屬性設定為 0.0 的值。This property is not applicable if the property is set to a value of 0.0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartHatchStyle BackHatchStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartHatchStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartHatchStyle value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.HatchStyleEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")
get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定帶狀線的影線樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the hatching style of the strip line.
A enumeration.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 規劃圖樣包含透明的背景色彩和背景上繪製線條。The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background. 所設定的影線樣式中使用的兩個色彩和屬性。The two colors used in the hatch style are set by the and properties. 這個屬性不適用如果屬性設定為 0.0 的值。This property is not applicable if the property is set to a value of 0.0.

summary.span: 取得或設定帶狀線的背景影像。

span.span: Gets or sets the background image of the strip line.

value.span: 值，表示影像檔案的 URL。

span.span: A value that represents an image file's URL.
The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性定義許多的圖表元素的背景影像路徑，而是絕對或相對 URL。The property defines a path to a background image for many chart elements, and is an absolute or relative URL. 若要調整此映像的位置，請使用和屬性。To position this image, use the and properties. 您也可以指定一種色彩會顯示為 「 透明 」 映像，藉由設定屬性。You can also specify that one color will be displayed by the image as "transparent" by setting the property. 影像可以是任何支援的.NET Framework，包括圖示的有效圖形檔。An image can be any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons. 這個屬性不適用如果屬性設定為 0.0 的值。This property is not applicable if the property is set to a value of 0.0. 背景影像的優先順序高於其他背景屬性，例如漸層色彩。Background images take precedence over other background properties, such as gradient colors.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageAlignmentStyle BackImageAlignment { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageAlignmentStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageAlignmentStyle value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定背景影像的對齊方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the background image alignment.
A enumeration value.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會決定帶狀線; 的背景影像的對齊方式它會套用的時，才屬性設定為。This property determines the alignment of the background image for strip lines; it is only applied when the property is set to . 如需可用的對齊方式的詳細資訊，請參閱列舉主題。For more information about available alignments, see the enumeration topic.

span.span: Gets or sets a color which will be replaced with a transparent color when the background image is drawn.

value.span: 將以透明方式顯示的 值。

span.span: A value that will be displayed as transparent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性不適用如果屬性設定為 0.0 的值。This property is not applicable if the property is set to a value of 0.0.

summary.span: 取得或設定帶狀線背景影像的繪製模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the drawing mode of the background image of the strip line.
A integer enumeration.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會決定顯示映像的方式;也就被並排縮放，等等。This property determines how the image is displayed; that is, tiled, scaled, and so forth. 如果調整映像，將會自動縮放以符合在週框的帶狀線。If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounding strip line. 如果影像會並排顯示，它會重複繪製，從左上角開始。If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner. 關於可用文繞圖模式的詳細資訊，請參閱列舉主題。For more information concerning the available wrapping modes, see the enumeration topic. 如果屬性設定為，其中繪製影像的位置取決於屬性設定。If the property is set to , the location where the image is drawn will be determined by the property setting. 這個屬性不適用如果設定為 0.0 的值。This property is not applicable if is set to a value of 0.0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color BackSecondaryColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定帶狀線背景的次要色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the secondary color of the strip line background.

value.span: 值，用於具有影線或漸層填滿的次要背景色彩。

span.span: A value used for the secondary color of a background with hatching or gradient fill.
The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會決定次要背景色彩，許多圖表物件，並套用漸層色彩時，會使用。This property determines the secondary background color of many chart objects, and is used when gradient colors are being applied. 您可以為任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍） 值來設定背景次要色彩。You can set background secondary color to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果使用影線，屬性會決定影線線的色彩。If hatching is used, the property determines the color of the hatching lines. 若要使用的圖表項目之背景的漸層色彩：To use gradient colors for the background of a chart element: - 使用屬性來設定主要色彩。Use the property to set the primary color. - 使用此屬性來設定次要色彩。Use this property to set the secondary color. - 設定的所需的漸層樣式的屬性。Set the property to the desired gradient style. 這個屬性不適用如果屬性設定為 0.0 的值。This property is not applicable if the property is set to a value of 0.0.

summary.span: 取得或設定帶狀線的框線色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the border color of a strip line.
A value.
The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以為任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍） 值來設定這個屬性。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果的屬性物件設定為 0.0，會繪製一條線，就是這個內容而非屬性設定會決定線條的色彩。If the property of a object is set to 0.0, a line will be drawn, and it is this property and not the property setting that will determine the color of the line.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會指定用於框線的線條樣式。This property specifies the line style used for a border. 行可以實線、 虛線或一些不同的實心和小數點。The line can be solid, dotted or some variation of solid and dotted.

summary.span: 取得或設定帶狀線的間隔，並且決定帶狀線只要繪製一次還是重複地繪製。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval for a strip line, and determines if the strip line is drawn once or repeatedly.

value.span: 值，表示帶狀線之間的間隔。

span.span: A value that represents the interval between strip lines.
The default value is zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您設定屬性設為零，一個帶狀線的值將會顯示，與所指定的寬度屬性。When you set the property to a value of zero, one strip line will be displayed, with a width specified by the property. 當您將設定非零的值，將會顯示多個帶狀線。When you set to a value of other than zero, multiple strip lines will be shown. 用於單元屬性由定義屬性。The unit that is used for the property is defined by the property.

span.span: A enumeration value that indicates the interval type.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 間隔類型，可以設定為，在此情況下的類型取決於： X 值或 Y 值的類型繪製物件，根據哪個座標軸物件屬於-和調整軸。Interval types can be set to , in which case the type depends on: the X-value or Y-value types of the plotted objects - depending on which axis the objects belong to - and the axis scale. 屬性決定繪製寬帶或線條的頻率。The property determines how often a strip or line is drawn.

summary.span: 取得帶狀線的名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the strip line.
A value that represents the name of the strip line.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定帶狀線的寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of a strip line.

value.span: 值，決定要繪製帶狀線還是線段。

span.span: A value that determines whether a strip or a line is drawn.
The default value is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法設定此屬性的值小於零，否則將會引發例外狀況。This property cannot be set to a value less than zero, otherwise an exception will be raised. 如果設定為 0.0 會導致正在繪製; 一條線將此行，和屬性設定其色彩、 寬度和樣式。A setting of 0.0 will result in a line being drawn; this line will use the , and property settings for its color, width and style. 沒有任何`Back*`利用這個類別中的屬性時的值為 0.0。None of the `Back*` properties in this class are utilized when the value of is 0.0. 如果您將設定屬性設為值小於或等於零，會建立區域。If you set the property to a value greater than zero, a strip will be created. ，並屬性只能套用至的框線區域; 所有`Back*`屬性則用於該區域的背景屬性。The , and properties only apply to the border of the strip; all of the `Back*` properties are then used for the background properties of the strip. 如果值屬性大於 0.0，單位取決於相關的軸刻度。If the value of the property is greater than 0.0, the units are determined by the relevant axis scale.

span.span: Gets or sets the unit of measurement for the property.

value.span: 表示寬度類型的 列舉值。

span.span: A enumeration value that indicates the width type.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會決定所使用的單位屬性。This property determines the units used for the property. 比方說，若要設定帶狀線來代表 「 一週，您可以設定此屬性為並設定一 (1.0) 的屬性。For example, to set a strip line to represent "one week", you could set this property to and set the property to one (1.0). 您可以變更此屬性的值要值時使用相關的軸刻度值。You can change the value of this property from to a value when the relevant axis scale uses a value.

summary.span: 取得或設定文字方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the text orientation.

value.span: 值，表示文字方向的對齊方式。

span.span: A value that represents the alignment of the text orientation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為值，文字的角度為依據的圖表類型。When this property is set to a value of , the text is oriented based on the chart type. 所有 X Y 圖表類型而非橫條圖、 x 軸的帶狀線文字都是導向水平方式從左到右的帶狀線的底部。For all X-Y chart types other than Bar, X-axis strip line text is oriented horizontally from left to right on the bottom of the strip line. 橫條圖中 x 軸的帶狀線文字是以垂直方式從上到右邊的帶狀線的下導向。For Bar charts, X-axis strip line text is oriented vertically from top to bottom to the right of the strip line.
